case_2.description:
Add a new controller with permission to `SET_DATA` + 3x allowed data keys:
`AddressPermissions[]`
+ `AddressPermissions[index]`
+ `AddressPermissions:Permissions:`
+ `AddressPermissions:AllowedERC725YDataKeys:

case_3.description: Update permissions of previous controller. Allow it now to `SUPER_SETDATA`

case_4.description:
Remove a controller:
1. decrease `AddressPermissions[]` Array length
2. remove the controller address at `AddressPermissions[index]`
3. set "0x" for the controller permissions under AddressPermissions:Permissions:

case_9.description: Set 2 x new data keys + add 3x new controllers
